name: StuffReminder
0:
”Alexa, open stuff reminder and add car keys in my office list.”
”Alexa, ask stuff reminder to read out my vacation list”
”Alexa, ask stuff reminder that I am leaving for vacation.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stuff reminder
des:
Stuff reminder helps you, keep the track of necessary stuffs like car keys, sun glasses, wallet, credit card, cell phones etc before you leave from home for like shopping, office, vacation or even for a job interview. It would remember all the things which you would ask it to remind you while leaving for office.

Detailed Features
(i) Add or delete items from your different list like office list, vacation list, shopping list etc
(ii) Not only remind you of the each stuff of your list but also present a checklist of items you missed.
(iii) In case you forget the items you added or deleted from your list, it will read out your list.
(iv) Empty your list at once.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
